channel.title: Jeff Daniels on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Jeff Daniels on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Jeff Daniels Takes Aim at Trump and His Supporters: “I Hope You’re Losing Tons of Money”
item.description: The actor said of the current president: “He’s everything that’s wrong with not just America but with being a human being.”
